ï»¿SignalsLink.EP
Extends the Signals mod with components that interact with the Electrical Progressive mod.

Electrical Progressive
EP Switch
A switch controlled by a signal. Allows switching the flow of electric current on or off.
If there is a signal on the input, the switch is on. If there is no signal on the input, the switch is off.
EP Meter
Allows obtaining information about the state of the electrical network to which the meter is connected.
If the input signal is 1, the output signal shows the charge level of batteries in the network.
If the input signal is 2, the output signal shows the production/consumption balance of electricity. Values 1-7: more is consumed than produced, 8: consumption=production, 9-15: electricity production exceeds consumption.
If the input is another signal, the output is signal 0.
